TopicTitle: Does anyone know of any games relating to the Internet?

Articles.Content: For a long time I have been looking for a game where you get to build and run the internet. Do you know of any?
Become a network engineer, they pay you to play this game.

Not a common topic for gaming, I don't know any games that comes even close to that...

...however, your topic made me think about a hacking game.. I know it's not even near what you're looking for, but it's a good game nonetheless... Uplink

Not a common topic for gaming, I don't know any games that comes even close to that...

...however, your topic made me think about a hacking game.. I know it's not even near what you're looking for, but it's a good game nonetheless... Uplink

This.

Uplink has all the little details that make games great, with a fantastic hacking setting. Someone has to make something similar to this SOON.
